About Me

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Nostrum quam voluptatibus

I am an English Language Educator and passionate debater with a strong background in teaching English to speakers of other languages (TESOL). Currently pursuing my Master's degree in TESOL, I am dedicated to creating engaging and interactive learning experiences for students. With experience as an Assistant Teacher and ECA Core Team Member at AL-HIDAYYAH INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL, I strive to foster a positive and supportive learning environment.

My academic journey includes a Bachelor's degree in English Language and Literature, where I consistently excelled, earning scholarships for my outstanding performance. I have also completed professional certifications, including a 120-hour TESOL course under World TESOL Academy. These experiences have equipped me with a solid foundation in language teaching methodologies and strategies.

Beyond the classroom, I am an accomplished debater and have received numerous accolades, including being crowned Champion at the ATN BANGLA Television National Debate Championship 2022. I have also been recognized as a Best Judge at prestigious debating competitions such as the Harvard College World School Invitational and the England and Wales World School Debating Championship International.

I am dedicated to personal and professional growth and have actively participated in leadership training programs, such as the British Council Active Citizen Youth Leadership Training. Additionally, I have a keen interest in digital marketing and have completed a course in that field.

Passionate about education and the power of effective communication, I am committed to making a positive impact in the lives of my students and promoting language learning in innovative ways. Let's connect and explore opportunities to collaborate and enhance language education together.

  1. May 2024 - Present

    English Teacher

    Presidency International School

    - Facilitate English language learning for students in an engaging and interactive manner. - Collaborate with fellow teachers to develop lesson plans and instructional materials. - Conduct assessments to evaluate students' language proficiency and track their progress. - Organize and lead extracurricular activities, such as debate clubs and public speaking events. - Assist in the coordination of school events and actively contribute to the ECA (Extra-Curricular Activities) Core Team. - Foster a positive and inclusive learning environment that encourages students' language development and personal growth.

  2. March 2022

    English Debate Secretary

    Bangladesh Debate Federation

  3. Jan 2023 - Mar 2024 · 1 yr 3 month

    English Teacher

    Al-Hidaayah International School

  4. March 2022

    English Debate Secretary

    Bangladesh Debate Federation
